meanings.definition: Not kind or pleasant in manner or disposition.
meanings.sent1: The unfriendly cat hissed at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent2: The unfriendly customer refused to speak to the cashier.
meanings.sent3: The unfriendly squirrel stole all the nuts from the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The unfriendly storm clouds blocked out the sun's warmth.
meanings.sent5: The unfriendly teacher never smiled or offered help to students.

meanings.sent1: The unfriendly weather ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: The unfriendly environment made it hard to relax.
meanings.sent3: The unfriendly traffic delayed our arrival to the party.
meanings.sent4: The unfriendly schedule left no time for breaks.
meanings.sent5: The unfriendly news cast a shadow over the celebration.

meanings.sent1: The unfriendly software required a complex installation process.
meanings.sent2: The unfriendly gate was locked, preventing entry.
meanings.sent3: The unfriendly packaging was difficult to open.
meanings.sent4: The unfriendly path was overgrown and hard to follow.
meanings.sent5: The unfriendly website layout confused many users.
